subject: Simsonn Plus X P2-H2, black, without baseplate
description_text: Will there be springs included in the package?Will there by a yellow, red, green or blue spring for the breakpedal included with the plus x? Or will i need to buy all springs separate?

conversations.body_text: Hi Gustav Wessbladh,    These are all complimentary accessories, requiring no additional purchase.   https://www.simsonn.com/products/simsonn-plus-x-pedals?variant=50297650970938
